ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Survey - System standards and Performance
ygData.msgSnippet: whatcha mean charm song doesnt work? worked fine for me 2 nights ago. Congratson the levs -Rakka -Minkin Sol Ro ... From: Cranfill, Wendy
ygData.messageBody:
whatcha mean charm song doesnt work? worked fine for me 2 nights ago.
Congratson the levs

-Rakka
-Minkin
Sol Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 27, 2000 10:18 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Survey - System standards and Performance


You get to play at work? GRRRRR
We used to until they decided our firewall needed to be more secure
*whine*

Although yesterday I even was told to knock off the ICQ or get written up ..
ugh!
Dang Bosses!

The good news is .. brand new levels for both:

Halana, 54 shaman
Tani, 27 bardette with a charm song that doesn't work!
Solusek Ro
